attributes.title: Small Hands
attributes.review: App was clearly designed for someone with small hands in mind. My hands are too big and cannot comfortably navigate.

attributes.title: Absolutely dangerous 🤢
attributes.review: I got this app to appreciate Donald ducky 🤧 but right when I opened the app I saw his face. It frightened me very much and I jumped off my bed and cracked my skull on the hard floor. Now I’m in the ER :/ do not download guys

attributes.title: Uh-Oh
attributes.review: In a constant search to better my self and recently seeing our white savior holding his trusty bible in a photo I thought “trump is the answer” he will deliver us. Unfortunately I am wrong. He’s a pig.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: Slowed my phone to the point of being nearly unusable. I have all kinds of viruses and malware and I probably have to just get a new phone 🙃.

attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review: I thought I could come on this app to get some information about trumps new campaign and all I found were lies and racist propaganda.

attributes.title: What is dis hunny
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever had it is so bad My dog went missing her name was martha,martha speaks let me tell you a story about Martha Martha😁was🥰an🙃average🐕dog. She went💨aërf🍒&🤕ærph😪&👻EEEER🤠when👧🏻she👄ate🤏🏻some🤖alphabet👽soup,🐶then🧦what🌸happened🌚was🌈bizarre🧽✨💕anyways anonymous 2020✨💕

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: Too many lag issues. Not much of a purpose for this app. Doesn’t really do much. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Just delete this this it stupid! It still work and I think it stealing information.

attributes.title: Best President Ever!
attributes.review: Awesome app!! Can’t wait for the next SEVERAL years with President Trump!
